entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 3:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
